document.full_text: in tunisia and egypt, "facebook" vied with "down with the regime" on graffiti-filled walls -- so central were social media to mobilizing mass protests that overthrew their authoritarian rulers.
document.title: when ak-47s meet mobile phones: syria's web activists
lines_and_colors: in tunisia and egypt, "facebook" vied with "down with the regime" on graffiti-filled walls -- so central were social media to mobilizing mass protests that overthrew their authoritarian rulers.
